00071 inline float affinity::cvmGet(const int i, const int j)
00072 {
00073   return data.fl[3 * i + j];
00074 }
00075 
00076 inline void  affinity::cvmSet(const int i, const int j, const float val)
00077 {
00078   data.fl[3 * i + j] = val;
00079 }
00080 
00081 inline void  affinity::cvmSet(const int i, const int j, const double val)
00082 {
00083   data.fl[3 * i + j] = (float)val;
00084 }
00085 
00086 inline float cvmGet(const affinity * A, const int i, const int j)
00087 {
00088   assert (A->rows == 3 && A->cols == 3);
00089 
00090   return A->data.fl[3 * i + j];
00091 }
00092 
00093 inline void cvmSet(const affinity * A, const int i, const int j, const float val)
00094 {
00095   assert (A->rows == 3 && A->cols == 3);
00096 
00097   A->data.fl[3 * i + j] = val;
00098 }
00099 
00100 inline void cvmSet(const affinity * A, const int i, const int j, const double val)
00101 {
00102   assert (A->rows == 3 && A->cols == 3);
00103 
00104   A->data.fl[3 * i + j] = (float)val;
00105 }
